name: PrisMorph
description:
You carry the Prism, an artefact of immense power. You have no memory of your past, you only know you must defend the Prism at all costs!

Use the Prism's ability to adapt to your enemy's attacks, as they attempt the insurmountable challenge of acquiring the Prism for their own nefarious deeds.

Use WASD or the arrow keys to move, aim with the mouse, and left click to use your ability!
